titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Desmodur BL XP 2468.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/22/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2009, the duty on copolymer of methyl ethyl ketoxime and toluenediisocyanate (Desmodur BL XP 2468).
